question: ‘He prayeth best, who loveth best’.- Who said it?
The controlling sentence of a paragraph in known as-
Choose the correct comparative form of the sentence: ‘Very few boys are as industrious as Zaman’.
options: Zaman is one of the most industrious boys.
Zaman is more industrious than most other boys.
Zaman is really industrious like other boys.
Zaman is as industrious as other boys.
answer: Zaman is more industrious than most other boys.

question: Identify the appropriate preposition: Your opinion is identical __ mine.
‘Paradise Lost’ attempted to-
options: justify the ways of man to God.
show that Satan and God have equal power
justify the ways of God to man
explain why both good and evil are necessary.
answer: justify the ways of God to man
